participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, with a penchant for storytelling.
participant_1.background: The only autographs I've ever wanted are from authors. My mother is a librarian. I used to wear glasses as a child. I'm applying for publishing jobs. My favorite color is green.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Sophisticated and laid-back, enjoys the finer things in life.
participant_2.background: I have a poodle named Nanette. I love smooth jazz. I work on Wall Street. I live in New York City. I actually like wearing suits and ties.

content.text: It's nice to meet you. What do you do for fun?
I like to listen to smooth jazz and relax.
That's nice. I like to read books and write stories.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read fiction, especially fantasy and science fiction.
Oh, I like those too! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Lord of the Rings.
That's a great book! I've read it a few times.
I love the part where Frodo and Sam are on their way to Mount Doom. It's so suspenseful.
That's a good part. I also like the part where they're at the Council of Elrond.
That's a good part too. It's so interesting to see all of the different races come together to decide what to do about the Ring.
Yeah, it's a really cool scene.
I'm glad we both like the Lord of the Rings.
Me too! It's a great book.
